intro: Pelargonium helmsii, commonly known as the Helmsii geranium, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, showy flowers that range in color from pink to red. The leaves are typically rounded and have a slightly hairy texture. It thrives in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil. This plant is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and containers.
